CustomField.formula:
IF( AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact_Type__c)),CONTAINS(Subject,"Email:")), "Email", IF( AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact_Type__c)),CONTAINS(Subject,"LinkedIn")), "LinkedIn", IF( AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact_Type__c)),CONTAINS(Subject,"InMail")), "LinkedIn", IF( AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact_Type__c)),CONTAINS(Subject,"Chorus")), "Chorus Meeting",
IF( AND(ISBLANK(TEXT(Contact_Type__c)),CONTAINS(Subject,"Drift")), "Drift", TEXT(Contact_Type__c))))))
CustomField.label: Contact Type excl Blank
